theThief:Stab.NAME: Stab
theThief:Stab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Backstab: Deal !theThief:BackstabTimesDamage! instead.

theThief:Persuasion.NAME: Persuasion
theThief:Persuasion.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Backstab: Gain !M! Strength instead.
theThief:Persuasion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Backstab: Gain !M! Strength instead.

theThief:Reobtain.NAME: Reobtain
theThief:Reobtain.DESCRIPTION: Fetch !M! card from your discard pile.
theThief:Reobtain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fetch !M! cards from your discard pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL Backstab: It also costs !M! less. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

theThief:PerfectDagger.NAME: Perfect Dagger
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL Backstab: Also increase this card's damage by !M! permanently.

theThief:AttackOfOpportunity.NAME: Attack Of Opportunity
theThief:AttackOfOpportunity.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add !theThief:Magic! Voids to your discard pile.
theThief:AttackOfOpportunity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add !theThief:Magic! Voids to your discard pile.

theThief:DirtyDeedsDDC.NAME: Dirty Deeds DDC
theThief:DirtyDeedsDDC.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If this kills a non-minion enemy, gain !M! gold.

theThief:ShadowForm.NAME: Shadow Form
theThief:ShadowForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a random card from any color. NL Backstab: Play !theThief:Magic! !theThief:BkStMgc! instead
theThief:ShadowForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a random card from any color. NL Backstab: Play !theThief:Magic! !theThief:BkStMgc! instead.
